channel.title: Help making server online [PLEASE LOOk]
channel.description: ok i made a host at no-ip. downloaded client and selected it. i portforwarded it. copiled. when i go into the egui folder and change the 127.0.0.1 to my no-ip it wont let me log in but when i change it back it lets me log in all help is appreciated

item.title: Help making server online [PLEASE LOOk]
item.dc:creator: @drawgornot drawgornot
item.description:
@drawgornot wrote:

it did not see me so i guess i did not portforward it right:( i think i did something wrong in my router. it has inbound port(#####)-(#####) and private port (#####)-(######) thats not how many numbers their are lol but wat do i put in the 2 spaces in inbound and the 2 spaces in private? do i just put 43594-43594?

Read full topic

item.title: Help making server online [PLEASE LOOk]
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

ok i was having this problem also and i was really worried but i found the answer. first of all the only way you can log in is with 127.0.0.1 idk why vista and windows 7 roll that way lol so in order for you to know if its working first thing to do is go to
http://canyouseeme.org/ and type in the port your using for your server most likely 43594 then see if it says success i can see or i cant see or something. if it sees that means your on and have a friend or me (just pm me) try it out with ip cuz you cant log in with your own ip you can only log in with 127.0.0.1 so me i had my friend test it out with my ip and he logged in -.- i was working for months cuz i couldnt log in when i put my ip but i guess thats just how it is lol PM me if you want me to try or if you need more help

Goodluck!

Read full topic
